LanguageData.HDPR.Name: HD Pawn Rendering
LanguageData.HDPR.ResInfo: The resolution used for pawn rendering. Vanilla is 128, this mod's default is 384.
LanguageData.HDPR.MipsInfo: This improves texture quality and fps when zooming out, while slightly increasing VRAM usage. Recommended ON
LanguageData.HDPR.AAInfo: Only use if you really want to waste some VRAM. In my own testing this resulted in an increase of 4x. Recommended OFF
LanguageData.HDPR.AALevelInfo: The level of anti-aliasing. Higher is stronger and more resource-intensive
